${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:rlcPeacekeeperFirmware.NAME: Peacekeeper Firmware
${modID}:rlcPeacekeeperFirmware.FLAVOR: PROTOCOL:: CONSERVE // CONSERVE // FUEL LEVELS SUBOPTIMAL // CONSERVE.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not spend all your [E] during your turn, gain an additional [E] and draw 1 additional card next turn.
